ygData.subject: Re: Alcohol Tolerance
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe what should happen when you re very drunk is you get messages saying your songs are a LOT more effective, when in reality they re doing less
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe what should happen when you're very drunk is you get messages saying
your songs are a LOT more effective, when in reality they're doing less
damage/effect. Heheh.

Course, bards really should be more effective after a few, but after 12? At
that point the bard should just be misled into thinking they're doing
better, while the rest of the party just sighs and looks over at the
shambling mound that was once a bard.

Roop
>
> In a Bards case, alcohol tolerance, IMHO should actually INCREASE the
>effects of our songs. For instance, when I was playing in a band I played
>100 times better when I was completely hammered. In the sense Verant is
>using it, being drunk seems to enhance a characters specialty (ie. Warriors
>fight better and main stats increase), so why shouldn't Bards become more
>rambunctious and charismatic?
>
>--Danner Bramblethorn
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
>http://www.onelist.com

>
